static checkIfUserIsInOrganization(session)¶

static addUserIfNotExists(session, organization=None)¶

Add user if the entry doesn’t already exists.

Parameters:

  • session (Dictionary) – POST request session

  • organization (None) – Dummy object to comply to interface of function with same name from sister class

Returns:

Information about the user. Necessary to check if database entry is equal to callback information
